readme.description: Run the `readme` task. Builds a `README.md` file from a `.verb.md` template. If a `.verb.md` file does not exist, verb will ask if you'd like to add one.

new.description: Generates a basic `.verb.md` file in the specified directory or current working directory.

ask.description: Asks you if you'd like to add a `.verb.md` template to your project. If `yes`, the `new` task is called, otherwise nothing.

--times.description: Display load times in the console.
